amendment.description: Amendment requires quarterly reports on the SBA Administrator's progress towards the expansion of the Renewable Energy Capital Investment Program and requires the SBA Administrator to establish regulations necessary to carry out the program within 180 days after enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B in House Report 111-317 to require quarterly reports on the SBA Administrators progress towards the expansion of the Renewable Energy Capital Investment Program. It would require the SBA Administrator to establish regulations necessary to carry out the program within 180 days after enactment.
